author: Lesley Waters
method: Preheat oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Start by rolling the venison meat into nine small balls.  Take a skewer and alternately place a venison ball then a prune; each skewer should have three venison balls and two prunes. Heat a frying pan add the oil and gently brown the kebabs. Place into the preheated oven for six minutes and serve.
ingredients: 3 venison sausages, skin removed,  6 prunes,  3 wooden skewers ,  1 tbsp olive oil
